alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Moultrie; Piatt; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:19PM CDT until August 03 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Coles County in east central Illinois... Northwestern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Northern Moultrie County in central Illinois... Southeastern Piatt County in central Illinois... Southwestern Vermilion County in east central Illinois... Southern Champaign County in east central Illinois... Douglas County in east central Illinois... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 418 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Philo to near Lovington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Philo and Sidney around 425 PM CDT. Broadlands around 430 PM CDT. Homer and Allerton around 435 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Arcola, Humboldt, Fairmount, Sidell, Catlin, Hindsboro, Rardin and Oakland. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 198 and 229. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Moultrie; Piatt; Vermilion
